title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Skills: Development of Augmented Reality-Based Emotional Design Mobile Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage skills and intermediate-level social studies practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for analyzing user emotional responses (based on 55 Kansei words) when designing AR-based learning materials
Learners can apply Kansei Engineering techniques to design visual/interactive elements of AR learning materials
Learners can produce AR content prototypes reflecting four key emotional factors (proficiency-motivation, confusion, wandering-excitement, challenge) and credibility elements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
